import React from "react"; import CommonBanner from "../../common/banner/CommonBanner"; import Footer from "../../common/footer/Footer"; import Header from "../../common/header/Header"; import InfoSection from "../../common/infoSection/InfoSection"; class PainPoints extends React.Component { render() { return ( <>
Addressing Pain Points

Problem: Freshers or Unemployed those who don’t have experience caught between the endless loop of Employers wanting preferring those who have at least Few years of experience and Candidates needing experience and opportunities

Solution: To prevent this deadlock, we have developed In house Programs for IT Training in all Technologies, along with Internship and Long Term In house R&D Projects. We give opportunities to Freshers and Unemployed who are eager to learn, perform and excel to Train them in all aspects of coding experience for Freshers and unemployed to Train, Mentor, Examine and Test their skills in Multiple Levels of Intense scrutiny and various parameters monitored and measured over a Length of Time before we present them for Employment opportunities for various companies, Clients and Partner Employers



Problem: Hardworking Talented Young Skilled Professionals mainly employed to New Age companies and Start-ups who are very Hands on and Eager to Learn and Master every Technology and Framework at their disposal but are often limited to exploring just 1 or 2 Technologies limited by their scope of work and don’t have chance to explore and work for New Technologies domains to provide their expertise to Larger scope of Customer Database generally dealt with International companies and clients

Solution: We provide opportunities and avenues with In house Projects along with collaboration with our Partner companies and Start-ups to explore their Hidden Talent, nurture it with Unlimited amount of Training Materials for all Technologies with Live Mentoring and Help from our Professional Trainers with decades of experience and Involve them in Live and Demo Projects and acclimatize them to working in Big and Bigger Teams to help them understand How Large Team dynamics work and what is expected of them regarding Deliverables and Timelines



Problem: Seasoned and experienced certified Professionals who are best at their core expertise, performing their duties Diligently and exceptionally for MNCs but often is the case their Core skills of expertise are limited to company specific Tools and Frameworks, spread across verticals and Horizontals segregated by domains say Finance, Healthcare, Manufacturing, Insurance etc

Solution: We actively Train them in all Technologies, Tools and Frameworks in all Domains and then make them actively participate on our In House Projects, R&D Projects and Live projects we undertake in collaboration with our Partner Network of companies and Training Organizations in Simulated Live Project Environments specific to Different Domains making them Market Ready to serve Any International Client in any Domain/Technology spread across all Verticals and Horizontals



Problem: Inefficient and outdated IT infrastructure leading to decreased productivity and high operational costs.

Solution: BRAINHR IT Solutions can help businesses modernize their IT infrastructure and optimize their operations by providing services such as cloud migration, network setup and management, and cybersecurity solutions. Our team of experts can evaluate the current IT infrastructure and design customized solutions to improve performance and reduce costs.

Problem: Lack of in-house IT expertise leading to delayed projects and increased risks.

Solution: BRAINHR IT Solutions can provide businesses with access to specialized IT skills and expertise, helping to fill the gap and mitigate risks. Our outsourcing services for software development, quality assurance, and project management can help businesses achieve their goals while reducing the burden on in-house staff. We also offer training and development programs to help businesses upskill their employees and build their in-house IT capabilities.



Problem: Inadequate data management leading to security breaches and non-compliance with regulations.

Solution: BRAINHR IT Solutions can help businesses establish effective data management practices, ensuring compliance with regulations and minimizing the risk of security breaches. Our services include data backup and recovery, data migration, and database administration. We also provide cybersecurity solutions to protect sensitive data and prevent unauthorized access. With our expertise in data management, businesses can focus on their core operations and leave their data management needs to us.



Problem: Small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) struggling to keep up with the fast-paced changes in the IT industry and maintain their IT infrastructure without compromising on their core business goals.

Solution: BrainHR IT Solutions provides SMBs with customized IT support and maintenance services, including network administration, hardware and software upgrades, security solutions, data backup and recovery, and more. Our team of experts will work closely with the business to understand their specific IT needs and provide solutions that help them stay up-to-date with the latest technology trends while minimizing downtime and maximizing productivity.



Problem: Businesses facing challenges in integrating their different IT systems and applications due to differences in technology, format, and structure, leading to data silos and inefficiencies.

Solution: Our team of IT experts provides businesses with customized IT integration solutions that help them streamline their IT systems and applications, enabling efficient and effective data sharing and communication across the organization. We use advanced tools and techniques to integrate different IT systems and ensure seamless data flow, reducing manual efforts and improving overall productivity.



Problem: Businesses struggling with cybersecurity threats and vulnerabilities, risking sensitive data breaches and loss of customer trust.

Solution: BrainHR IT Solutions provides businesses with comprehensive cybersecurity solutions, including risk assessment, security planning and implementation, threat detection and response, and employee training. Our team of cybersecurity experts uses the latest technology and tools to provide businesses with a robust and secure IT environment, protecting their critical data and systems from cyber threats and ensuring compliance with industry regulations.



Problem: Low employee engagement leading to high turnover rates and decreased productivity.

Solution: BRAINHR IT Solutions can help businesses increase employee engagement by implementing customized HR solutions. This can include performance management systems, employee recognition programs, and talent development programs. Our team of HR experts can work closely with businesses to design and implement solutions that meet their unique needs and improve employee engagement.



Problem: Lack of digital transformation leading to decreased competitiveness and revenue loss.

Solution: BRAINHR IT Solutions can help businesses undergo a digital transformation by providing services such as digital strategy development, process automation, and data analytics. By leveraging cutting-edge technologies and practices, we can help businesses improve efficiency, customer experience, and revenue streams, while staying competitive in the market.



Problem: Inefficient supply chain management leading to increased costs and decreased customer satisfaction.

Solution: BRAINHR IT Solutions can help businesses optimize their supply chain management by providing services such as supply chain analysis, vendor management, and logistics optimization. By implementing data-driven solutions, we can help businesses reduce costs, improve delivery times, and enhance customer satisfaction. Our team of supply chain experts can work closely with businesses to design and implement solutions that improve their overall supply chain management.



We also believe People without an education shouldn’t have Road Block or any hindrances to pursue their Dreams. We believe in providing opportunities to each and every one to perform and excel in their chosen fields and areas of expertise. Those with education will have a head start, but we provide free Training camps, Online Coaching & Training Materials free of cost to those who cannot afford it and come from lesser educated backgrounds Like English speaking and communication skills to give them decent Job opportunities with our Network of BPO employers and Partners along with Companies modeled around Data Entry Tasks

We don’t stop there. We encourage and train them in coding for different Platforms and motivate them to pursue programs modeled around MBA, HR, Marketing and Finance operations to help them pursue different career options in due course. We second the fact that in many cases Most Talented Professionals leading and driving the change in the world have been drop Outs or with Minimal education or experience not core specific to what they have built. We 100% believe and support Biggest Companies driving the International Market in the world where they have made education not a mandatory qualification for their Jobs.

); } } export default PainPoints;
